name: Town Portal Scroll

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleports its wielder to the unit-targeted allied building. Increases the teleport channel time when multiple allied heroes simutaneously channels to the same allied building.
notes: Acquiring Boots of Travel unlocks subsequent Teleport levels
Consumes mana, goes into cooldown and does nothing when channeling is interrupted
Cannot be cast while rooted or leashed
Doubletap automatically targets the Fountain when exceeding min distance
Requires Boots of Travel upgrades to directly target allied units
Channel time increases linearly for multiple heroes teleporting to same building
Does not increase channel time when teleporting to Fountain
All ability effects are visible and audible to everyone
Grants 1-second 200-radius flying vision at teleport destination during channeling

additionalInfo: Alt shows your allied heroes' teleport status and cooldowns under their portraits
All heroes start the game with an unsellable Town Portal Scroll
Grants a charge whenever a hero dies to an enemy or allied unit
Town Portal Scrolls gained upon death have no gold value and don't affect Net Worth
Unsellable Town Portal Scrolls in a stack make every item in the stack unsellable
Heroes have a dedicated Town Portal Scroll slot on the HUD
Item can neither be dropped nor carried in inventory or backpack
Couriers can transport the item and allow dropping/sharing when in courier inventory
